casebody.data:
REFYL, INC.
v.
AMERIGAS PROPANE. No. 20P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 18, 2007. Julia F. Youngman, Raleigh, for AmeriGas Propane. Walter E. Brock, Jr., David M. Duke, Raleigh, for Refyl, Inc.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th day of January 2007 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 18th day of January 2007."
